description: This is a configuration module for the TicTacToe API, defining environment-specific configuration classes (BaseConfig, DevelopmentConfig, ProductionConfig, TestingConfig) with environment variable handling, security, database, CORS, logging, and application settings.

classes.name: BaseConfig
classes.description: Base configuration class with common settings for the TicTacToe API, including security, database, CORS, logging, and environment initialization.

classes.name: DevelopmentConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for development environment, enabling debug mode and specific database URI.

classes.name: ProductionConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for production environment, disabling debug, setting production database URI, and overriding CORS and security settings.

classes.name: TestingConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for testing environment, enabling testing mode, in-memory database, and disabling CSRF.

methods.name: get_env_var
methods.description: Utility function to retrieve environment variables with type conversion and default fallback.

methods.name: init_app
methods.description: Class method to initialize Flask app with configuration settings, ensuring directories exist and validating configuration.

methods.name: validate_config
methods.description: Static method to validate essential configuration settings and environment consistency.
